eventInfo.title: InRealArt 2024 & Sénéchal Catalog
eventInfo.place:
Where: Restaurant de la Gare, Place de la Gare, 1322 Croy Romainmôtier, Switzerland
Monday to Friday 8 a.m. to 11 p.m. | Saturday 8:30 a.m. to midnight | Sunday closed

artist.title:
“What you see makes you happy, it's all there”
Catherine Sénéchal
artist.text2: Discover the refined world of Catherine Sénéchal, a contemporary artist who combines boldness and elegance. Her vibrant, intuitive works captivate with their visual richness and sincerity. Inspired by Brancusi, she offers a unique sensory experience, where tradition and modernity meet. Acquiring a painting from Catherine is an incredible momentum to enter an exclusive circle of contemporary art, combining emotion and rarity.

expert.title:
Sénéchal perceives colors
as a symbol of joy, life and energy
...
expert.words: ... a vitality that permeates his work. Her bold compositions - portraits, interiors, still lifes, urban landscapes and geometrically inspired works - express human emotions, from joy to sorrow. Through her art, she invites viewers to feel and explore their own feelings”
expert.name: Meulemans Catherine
expert.role: Head of Sales Founder Galerie Art Thema

stats.title: Browsing InReal Art’s catalog

whyChooseUS.title: Why choosing us ?
whyChooseUS.subTitle:
Explore a unique collection of physical paintings and rare sculpture,
their digital copies (NFT), accompanied by their copyrights.
whyChooseUS.cardText1:
With over 80 years of combined experience, our team selects less than 100 works by renowned artists, chosen for their uniqueness and their ability to enrich a collection.

Whether you're a novice or a seasoned collector, acquiring these rare pieces is a privilege, offering distinction and value to your collection.
whyChooseUS.cardText2:
Our marketplace innovates by integrating physical works, NFTs and fractional copyrights.

Thanks to blockchain, we ensure transparent and secure transactions transactions, guaranteeing the traceability of works. This approach enables collectors access to a unique and diverse art market.
whyChooseUS.cardText3:
Art is both a passion and an investment opportunity. Our platform enables you to diversify your portfolio with physical, digital and copyright works.rights.

The rarity of the pieces on offer offers potential for appreciation. Whether you're a novice or an expert, you're entering a market where art can become become a source of lasting value.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.artist1: “With InRealArt, I can take Pictural Reverism to the pinnacle of its art and pass on my heritage in a timeless way through these canvases. It's a unique opportunity to merge tradition and innovation, offering a new dimension to my work.“
testimonials.artist2: “Thanks to InRealArt, I can take my artistic vision and pop art to new horizons and share my innovative work with the whole world. It's a privilege to be part of this revolution, where each work transcends time and finds its place in the future of art.“

catalogueRequest.title: Catalog Croy Romainmôtier  2024
catalogueRequest.subTitle: Explore a unique collection of physical canvases, their digital copies (NFT) and their copyrights.

placeForYou.title: A place that's just like you
placeForYou.description: To offer you a unique experience, InRealArt has created a marketplace connected to the real world through its partner galleries. It's easy to find the works that inspire you, whether you're a professional or an individual. Join us now on IRA!

community.description:
There are so many rare moments at InRealArt that we warmly invite you that we warmly invite you to join our Discord and enjoy all the web3 and phygital experience we have to offer. Sharpen your artistic sense by winning exclusive airdrops! Win invitations to take part in sumptuous vernissages with our artists... InReal Art is the "Golden Key" of the art world.
We'll open every door for you, so keep an eye out and be curious!
